content: Hi Surajit! It's nice to meet you. How can I assist you today?

CarryMinati is a popular Indian YouTuber and streamer known for his gaming content and commentary. His real name is Ajey Nagar, and he was born on June 12, 1999. He is particularly famous for his roast and reaction videos, and has gained a massive following in India and globally.
what is the stock price of bitcoin right now

As of my knowledge cutoff, the current stock price of Bitcoin is around $43,119. Please note that cryptocurrency prices can fluctuate rapidly, so this information may not be up-to-date. For the most recent and accurate price, I recommend checking a reliable cryptocurrency exchange or website.
write a leave note to my principle

Here is a leave note to your principal:

Dear Principal,

I am writing to request a leave of absence for [number] days, starting from [date]. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and will ensure that my work is caught up upon my return.

Thank you for considering my request.

Sincerely,
Surajit Sutradhar
It was nice chatting with you, Surajit! Have a great day!
